Package webemex.eshop.controller

Class UserManagementController

java.lang.Object
webemex.eshop.controller.UserManagementController
@RestController @CrossOrigin public class UserManagementController extends Object
Controller responsible for managing user-related operations in the e-shop. It handles user registration, login, token refresh, and administrative operations such as updating and deleting users.

  • Method Details

    • register

      @PostMapping("/auth/register") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthorizationDTO> register(@RequestBody AuthorizationDTO reg)
      Registers a new user in the system.
      Parameters:
      reg - the AuthorizationDTO containing registration information.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with an AuthorizationDTO containing the authentication token for the registered user.

    • login

      @PostMapping("/auth/login") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthorizationDTO> login(@RequestBody AuthorizationDTO req)
      Authenticates a user and provides an authorization token upon successful login.
      Parameters:
      req - the AuthorizationDTO containing login information.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with an AuthorizationDTO containing the authentication token for the logged-in user.

    • refreshToken

      @PostMapping("/auth/refresh") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthorizationDTO> refreshToken(@RequestBody AuthorizationDTO req)
      Refreshes the authentication token for the user.
      Parameters:
      req - the AuthorizationDTO containing the refresh token.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with an updated AuthorizationDTO containing the new token.

    • getAllUsers

      @GetMapping("/admin/get-all-users") @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'ADMIN\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthorizationDTO> getAllUsers()
      Retrieves a list of all users, accessible only by administrators.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with an AuthorizationDTO containing all registered users.

    • getUserByID

      @GetMapping("/admin/user/{userId}") @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'ADMIN\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthorizationDTO> getUserByID(@PathVariable UUID userId)
      Retrieves information about a specific user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - the UUID of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with the AuthorizationDTO containing the user's details.

    • updateUser

      @PutMapping("/admin/update/{userId}") @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'ADMIN\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthorizationDTO> updateUser(@PathVariable UUID userId, @RequestBody AppUser reqres)
      Updates information about a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the UUID of the user to update.
      reqres - the updated AppUser information.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with the updated AuthorizationDTO.

    • getMyProfile

      @GetMapping("/user/get-profile") @PreAuthorize("isAuthenticated()") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthorizationDTO> getMyProfile()
      Retrieves the profile information of the currently authenticated user.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with the AuthorizationDTO containing the user's profile information.

    • deleteUser

      @DeleteMapping("/admin/delete/{userId}") @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'ADMIN\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthorizationDTO> deleteUser(@PathVariable UUID userId)
      Deletes a specific user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - the UUID of the user to delete.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity indicating the outcome of the deletion.

    • isUsernameAvailable

      @PostMapping("/user/is-username-available") public IsUsernameAvailableResponseDTO isUsernameAvailable(@RequestBody IsUsernameAvailableRequestDTO req)
      Checks if a given username is available.
      Parameters:
      req - the IsUsernameAvailableRequestDTO containing the username to check.
      Returns:
      an IsUsernameAvailableResponseDTO indicating whether the username is available.
